@base.description: Used to set the base IRI against which relative IRIs are resolved

@container.description: Used to set the default container type for a term.

@id.description: Used to uniquely identify things that are being described in the document with IRIs or blank node identifiers.

@language.description: Used to specify the language for a particular string value or the default language of a JSON-LD document.

@list.description: Used to express an ordered set of data.

@set.description: Used to express an unordered set of data and to ensure that values are always represented as arrays.

@type.description: Used to set the data type of a node or typed value.

@value.description: Used to specify the data that is associated with a particular property in the graph.

@vocab.description: Used to expand properties and values in @type with a common prefix IRI

@context.description: Used to define the short-hand names that are used throughout a JSON-LD document.
